news.title: US military officials in Kyiv as Europe warns against reported Russia peace plan
news.summary: It comes after reports the US and Russia have prepared a 28-point peace plan, allegedly with major concessions from Ukraine.

news.title: The private notes and secret documents that tell the inside story of the UK's Covid response
news.summary: The Covid inquiry is set to publish its second set of findings looking in detail at the huge political decisions that had to be made in 2020.

news.title: Rapist ex-Met officer given another life sentence for further sex offences
news.summary: David Carrick is sentenced for sexually abusing a 12-year-old girl and raping a former partner.

news.title: Trump signs bill ordering US justice department to release Epstein files
news.summary: The bill gives the US Justice Department 30 days to release all the files in a searchable format.

news.title: Burnham refuses to rule out challenging Starmer for leadership
news.summary: Burnham says he is focused on his current role as Manchester mayor but could not say what the future holds.

news.title: Children in Need chair resigns after crash conviction
news.summary: Terence Duddy has been replaced as chair of BBC Children in Need after he drove into a cyclist.

news.title: Failed asylum seekers could be given 'big increase' in payments to leave UK, home secretary says
news.summary: Home secretary says she will consider "a big increase" in payments to persuade people to leave the UK voluntarily.

news.title: Teachers in Scotland could work flexible four-day week in class under new plans
news.summary: Two teaching unions are holding strike ballots over how long teachers should spend in the classroom.

news.title: How bravery of two women led to 'monster' Met officer's conviction for more sex crimes
news.summary: David Carrick is already serving life in prison, but he now faces a further sentence.

news.title: The real fallout after the ousting of Labour from a super safe seat in Wales
news.summary: Now Labour faces its toughest task yet in Wales - convincing voters to keep believing, ahead of the 2026 Senedd election
